activities: Antea receives its clients and employee's personal information for business purposes, such as i) matters relating to day to day business operations, job roles, compensation and benefits, performance assessments and training, ii) offering services and benefits to employees,and iii) compliance with our legal obligations.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, manually processed data, human resources data
recoursemech: EU and Swiss data protection authorities
